mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.order_no, o.user_id, o.counselor_id, o.consult_type, o.consult_way, o.price, o.price as pay_amount, o.status, o.consult_time, DATE_FORMAT(o.consult_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as consult_date, DATE_FORMAT(o.consult_time, '%H:%i') as start_timeslot, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(o.consult_time, INTERVAL 50 MINUTE), '%H:%i') as end_timeslot, CASE WHEN HOUR(o.consult_time) < 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as is_am, DATE_FORMAT(o.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as order_create_time, o.created_at, CASE WHEN o.status = 0 THEN GREATEST(0, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), DATE_ADD(o.created_at, INTERVAL 30 MINUTE))) ELSE 0 END as payment_available_minutes, c.name as counselor_name, c.head_url as counselor_head_url, vi.name as visitor_name, 0 as consult_stage, 0 as creator_type FROM consult_order o LEFT JOIN counselor c ON o.counselor_id = c.id LEFT JOIN visitor_info vi ON o.user_id = vi.user_id WHERE o.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO consult_order (order_no, user_id, counselor_id, consult_type, consult_way, price, status, consult_time, created_at) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{counselorId}, #{consultType}, #{consultWay}, #{price}, #{status}, #{consultTime}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE consult_order SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
